Class AddNewAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container

              • com.smarthome.emulator.simulations.forms.AddNewAdapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants

    public class AddNewAdapter
extends javax.swing.JDialog
    Dialog for adding new AdapterPanel to DetailedSimulation. Contains Adapter and Server information, which are after inserting validated.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
